body_html:
The tensors become different because of this line:

pytorch/torch/csrc/autograd/variable.h

Line 26 in b3589b0

: data(variable.data->clone_shallow())

I don't remember exactly why we call clone_shallow(). I think it may just be a convenient way to effectively increment the refcount and get a unique_ptr.

      in

I don't remember exactly why we call clone_shallow(). I think it may just be a convenient way to effectively increment the refcount and get a unique_ptr.
body:
The tensors become different because of this line:

https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/b3589b04fd371cbaba7673cec538d3f37576d413/torch/csrc/autograd/variable.h#L26

I don't remember exactly why we call `clone_shallow()`. I think it may just be a convenient way to effectively increment the refcount and get a `unique_ptr`.
